text: Dawuda ya kame keken yaƙinsa guda dubu, mahayan keken yaƙinsa dubu bakwai8.4 Seftuwajin (duba kuma Naɗaɗɗun Littattafan Matacce Teku da kuma 1Tar 18.4); Nassin Masoretik kame mahayan keken yaƙinsa ɗari goma sha bakwai, da sojojin ƙasa dubu ashirin. Ya yayyanke agaran dawakan duka amma ya bar dawakai kekunan yaƙi ɗari.
